snippet: Angry protests occurred outside the Royal Courts of Justice, after an inquest jury decided that police officers had acted lawfully when they shot and killed an unarmed man they suspected of carrying a gun in 2011.
abstract: Angry protests occurred outside the Royal Courts of Justice, after an inquest jury decided that police officers had acted lawfully when they shot and killed an unarmed man they suspected of carrying a gun in 2011.

headline.main: Anger in London, as Killing of Unarmed Man That Sparked Riots Is Called Lawful
